title: Needed player nerfs
body:
1) Nerf Pantheon block ratio, his weaker kit is not an excuse to give him infinite blocks(Had one literally block 4/5 q's in a row, and tower hits)

2)Rengar insane burst damage against tanks with heavy armor is bugged/needs a nerf

3)Delete Yasuo, almost everyone that plays him is toxic and rage quits if they lose lane

4)Delete teemo, useless champion that offers nothing to his team other than to troll early game

5)Lower gragas jump range, entirely too long(the pros abusing it should be obviously to this point)

6)Sivir kit needs a rework, the overwhelming winning stats on here make that obvious, that and pros playing here non-stop

7) All true damage needs to be changed, really no reason for it, it makes armor/magic resistance useless and simply having "more hp" is not a solution as that doesn't reduce the damage.

Nope, not a bronze player.. Just a noob in his first week playing. Go easy on him.
None of these "problems" will be problems once you get out of noob-tier and learn a bit.


Pantheon:  cant block 4 attacks in a row.
Rengar: Armor pen. also you probably fed him. It is definitely not a bug.
Yasuo players: i get your point here, but you are crying just as hard as they do.
Teemo: He is a great champ that you apparently have never seen played properly (unsurprising, given your apparent MMR and his reputation).
Gragas: Yes, he is annoying, but more than hecarim, riven, lee, zac?
Sivir: HAD a rework quite recently, but probably before you started playing.. Her winrates are fine.
True damage: You got wrecked by a fed vayne, right? That happens in skill matchups, when someone tries to blame mechanics and bugs instead of their own lack of skill.

Sigh, if you're an experienced league player as you clearly want to try and portray yourself to be, then you'd know these third party stats sites are mostly garbage. I'm level 20 on this account currently and i've had various level 30 accounts in the past over the years, so you can stop making assumptions. And none of these champions I mentioned win lane or do well because of 'skill', true damage needs to be removed entirely, vayne is indeed a perfect example of why. Or maybe Garen or Darius, or the various others that delete people with it.

Pantheon can very easily lose lane due to poor skill if he mis manages his resources against an opponent that builds to fight pantheon instead of rushing straight damage.  Plus his ult requires a veeeery good understanding of battle flow or you just end up telegraphing/hanging in the wind.

Gragas also requires skill.  Sure he can be mobile as hell but a bad ult will do more damage than help and using Q to the max requires practice.

You want a low skill champ?  Singed, he runs around farting and hopes you chase him while throwing giant slows and getting a speed and regen steroid.
None of those are necessary... Not to mention they are ridiculous.
So glad RIOT does not listen to bronze players.
If you want i'll play you 1v1 any lane, and complete destroy you. I'll even record it for good measure and post it online, so you can make up a bunch of excuses. What do you say?
